tool_description: This API provides on a quasi-daily basis, the amount of carbon dioxide (CO2) in the atmosphere from 2010.01.01 to the present. It is expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).
title: Daily atmosphere  carbon dioxide concentration

api_list.name: Carbon dioxide endpoint
api_list.description: The response will be an object with no CORS resources enabled.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-atmosphere-carbon-dioxide-concentration.p.rapidapi.com/api/co2-api"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-atmosphere-carbon-dioxide-concentration.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What is the current carbon dioxide concentration in the atmosphere?
Can you provide the latest CO2 levels in the atmosphere?
What was the atmospheric CO2 concentration on January 1, 2020?
Give me the carbon dioxide levels from March 15, 2015.
What is the mole fraction of CO2 in dry air today?
Can you fetch the atmospheric CO2 levels for December 25, 2018?
What are the latest CO2 concentration readings in parts per million?
Provide the carbon dioxide levels in the atmosphere for July 4, 2019.
What is the current CO2 mole fraction in dry air?
Can you retrieve the atmospheric CO2 concentration for October 31, 2017?
